actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Water and Power.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to conduct an advanced water treatment research and demonstration project near Salton Sea, California.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to conduct, through the Commissioner of Reclamation, an advanced waste treatment and demonstration project for the development of technologies for saline water treatment in the area of the Salton Sea of Southern California. Sets the non-Federal share of the cost at 25 percent. Requires a report to the Congress on project results. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to conduct an advanced water treatment research and demonstration project near Salton Sea, California.
